mapper.insert: insert into members (email, password, name , nickname , phone, birthday, image, givenewpwA, givenewpwQ) values(#{email}, #{password}, #{name},#{nickname} ,#{phone} ,#{birthday},#{image} ,#{givenewpwA},#{givenewpwQ})
mapper.update: update members set nickname = #{nickname}, phone = #{phone}, givenewpwA =#{givenewpwA}, givenewpwQ = #{givenewpwQ} where email = #{email}
mapper.insert: insert into secession (SELECT * FROM members where email = #{email})
